channel.title: Snigdh M Singh on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Snigdh M Singh on Home

item.title: 1. Image Classification | Computer Vision
item.description: Created a face recognition model to classify athletesâ€™ face on small datasets with 83% of accuracy and 83% of F1 score for SVM. Enhanced feature engineering using Wavelet transformation of image, highlighting facial features. Optimized parameters using GridSearchCV and best performance achieved for SVM. Improved performance by using Convolutional Neural Networks. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 2. Loan Default Predictions | Artificial Neural Network
item.description: Built an ANN model to predict Loan defaults. Prevented overfitting using Keras layers combined with dropouts. Synthetic Minority Oversampling Technique used to improve the model performance as dataset was highly imbalanced. Final model able to recall 74% of the total loan defaults with F1 score of 62%. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 3. Movies Recommendation System
item.description: We can develop a basic recommendation system using Python and pandas. We could focus on providing this recommendation system by suggesting items that are most similar to a particular item, in this case, movies. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 4. Covid Dataset Dashboard
item.description: Data exploration, transformation, extraction using MySQL Server. Created a Dashboard on Tableau Public from the extracted Data containing useful plots. Link to SQL Code Link to Tableau Dashboard

item.title: 5. Real Estate Price Prediction | Regression
item.description: Built robust ML models to predict property prices based on certain features like number of bedrooms, square feet, location etc. Cleaned the dataset, removed outliers and did dimensionality reduction. Gridsearchcv used for hyperparameter tunning with 5-fold cross validation implemented to check acuuracy of the best estimator. Final model able to make good price predictions with MSE = 27.98 and STD = 71.13 Link to GitHub Repository
